pm.expect(target.location.lon.toString()).equal(source.location.lon.toString(), 'Event location longitude(lon) in request and response must be equal');
pm.expect(target.requestModeration.toString()).equal(source.requestModeration.toString(), 'Event "requestModeration" parameter in request and response must be equal');
